short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart contract interaction monitor that warns you if you're interacting with a suspicious address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wallet Rank helps you navigate the Crypto world safely! 

This Chrome Extension monitors your MetaMask interactions and uses multiple sources to decide whether the smart contract you're interacting with is trustworthy. It also allows the community to manually flag suspicious addresses, making it a tool that continuously learns from false negatives.

In addition, it can be used to quickly check the reputation of an address, at a single click of a button!
